title: Airline Tycoon Evolution - T-PLAGUE
description:

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                               Post Information
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Posted by............: T-PLAGUE
Posted on............: 5/21/2008

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                                 Release Notes
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 With Airline Tycoon Evolution you manage your own airline company and try to 
get ahead of your nasty adversaries. To help you do this, you have all the means 
available to a modern airline company at your disposal.

Buy the aircraft which are already on the market or try your hand as an aircraft 
constructor. Land some orders and plan your fleet of aircraft in such a way that 
you are also in a position to offer profitable flights on the bitterly contested 
global routes network.

In the struggle for your share price you alone must decide whether to build up a 
cut-price airline or to put all your energy into an airline with luxuriously 
kitted-out aircraft. The right advertising will not be an insignificant factor 
in the question ofwhether you can push through your ticket prices or whether you 
will have to adapt to what the market dictates.

If all your efforts are in vain, you should get hold of some information, 
because knowledge is power. Find out what your passengers think, and hire the 
right advisers, who will be only too pleased to help you: for a fat reward, that 
is.

Airline Tycoon Evolution is the continuation of the Airline Tycoon and Airline 
Tycoon ÃƒÂ» First Class games, which have been a worldwide success. Features ÃƒÂ² 
High-resolution, fun cartoon graphics and highly detailed animation. ÃƒÂ² 
User-friendly and entertaining: holds back on too many dry statistics ÃƒÂ² Level of 
passenger satisfaction is shown with the help of animation ÃƒÂ² Contains adventure, 
building add-ons and infotainment elements ÃƒÂ² Total of 30 different missions, in 
addition free play is possible ÃƒÂ² You can construct your own aircraft and use 
them in the game ÃƒÂ² You can exchange your own aircraft with those of other 
players over the Internet ÃƒÂ² The new security features mean you can act to 
prevent sabotage ÃƒÂ² Networking support for up to 4 players enables players to 
sabotage one another directly. 

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                                 Install Notes
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1. Mount .iso
2. Install
3. Have fun!

Please help SEED this rare torrent. If sharing, please give credits to me.

Thanks,
